name: part_006
file: tmp_[3D LIVE] Climax Story Live - Ending Summer w⧸ Swimsuits & Yukata! (35 holoJP members) #皆で観ようホロサマライブ [zQuFRSi5ebc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Botan, Lamy, Polka, and Nene discuss the previous performance and do some poses for the audience.
Announcement of Hololive Summer 2022 merchandise featuring 35 members in their swimsuit outfits.
Performance of 'Yumemiru Sora e' by Gen 0, Gen 1, and Gamers members.

subtitles.original: マジでめちゃくちゃ可愛かったわ。
subtitles.english: It was seriously so cute.

subtitles.original:
可愛かった〜。
ねえ、すごいダンスも可愛かったし。
subtitles.english:
So cute~
Yeah, the dance was really cute too.

subtitles.original: シオン先輩がすごい可愛かった。
subtitles.english: Shion-senpai was so cute.

subtitles.original: ねえ、ちょこちょこ、ちょこちょこして。
subtitles.english: Yeah, those little pitter-patter movements.

subtitles.original:
ねえ、ちょこちょこした動きがさ、ちょっとさ、
身長低い組とスレンダーなちょこ先だとさ、
subtitles.english:
Those little movements, you know...
and between the short group and slender Choco-sen,

subtitles.original: 全然差が出てて可愛かった。
subtitles.english: there was a total contrast and it was so cute.

subtitles.original: ねえ、でもシオン先輩キレッキレで好き。
subtitles.english: Yeah, but I loved how sharp Shion-senpai was.

subtitles.original: ねえ、キレッキレだった！
subtitles.english: Yeah, she was so sharp!

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあうちらも。
subtitles.english: Okay, then we should also...

subtitles.original: あ、そうだね！
subtitles.english: Oh, that's right!

subtitles.original: アピールタイムする？アピールタイムね！
subtitles.english: Shall we do some appeal time? Appeal time!

subtitles.original: 何しよ？え、何するの？
subtitles.english: What should we do? Eh, what are we doing?

subtitles.original:
ちょっと、ねねが得意なんじゃない？
スクショタイムみたいなのいっちゃいますか？
subtitles.english:
Wait, isn't Nene good at this?
Shall we do something like a screenshot time?

subtitles.original: 上手いね、ねね！上手い！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: You're good at this, Nene! So good! Yay!

subtitles.original: え、ちょっとやっぱみんなこれやりたいよね？
subtitles.english: Eh, wait, everyone wants to do this, right?

subtitles.original: え、ちょっとまずこれで固まろうよ。
subtitles.english: Eh, let's first strike a pose like this.

subtitles.original: なんかバレーボールみたいになってない？
subtitles.english: Doesn't this look like volleyball?

subtitles.original: 違う、レシーブ！レシーブ返し！
subtitles.english: No, it's a receive! A counter-receive!

subtitles.original: もういいから、いいから！次はダンス！時間！時間！
subtitles.english: Enough already! Next is the dance! Time! Time!

subtitles.original: 時間ちょっと出してもらって！バッチリ決めて！
subtitles.english: Give us a little more time! Let's get it together!

subtitles.original: はい、せーの！アハ〜ン！
subtitles.english: Okay, one, two! Ahan~

subtitles.original: いいじゃん、いいじゃん！やだ〜！
subtitles.english: That's good, that's good! Oh, stop it~

subtitles.original:
なんか普通にさ、みんなでわーっとした感じでさ、
はい！イェーイ！
subtitles.english:
Let's just do a normal, excited one together.
Okay! Yay!

subtitles.original: ごらんとありがとう！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thanks for watching! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 水着といえばさ！
subtitles.english: Speaking of swimsuits!

subtitles.original: 水着といえばさ！テンション上げ上げ！
subtitles.english: Speaking of swimsuits! Get hyped up!

subtitles.original:
この水着衣装シャイニーウェーブver.来た！
私たちのも！
subtitles.english:
The Shiny Wave ver. swimsuit costumes are here!
Ours too!

subtitles.original: え、今日販売されるんだって！
subtitles.english: Eh, they're going on sale today!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ・サマー2022グッズ
subtitles.english: hololive Summer 2022 Goods

subtitles.original: はい、そして出るんですか？はい、こちらなんと今日から受注販売開始！
subtitles.english: Yes, and what's coming? Yes, these are actually starting pre-order today!

subtitles.original: 3Dアクリルスタンド！そしてランダム缶バッジ！
subtitles.english: 3D Acrylic Stands! And Random Tin Badges!

subtitles.original: はい、プレミアムアクリルパネル！こちらの三種類の商品があるということで！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yes, Premium Acrylic Panels! We have these three types of merchandise! Yay!

subtitles.original: そしてそして、内容はこんな感じ！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: And, here's what they look like! Yay!

subtitles.original: アクリルスタンドはもうね、35種類あるんでね！
subtitles.english: As for the Acrylic Stands, there are 35 different kinds!

subtitles.original: ぜひゲットしてね！多いな！
subtitles.english: Make sure to get them! That's a lot!

subtitles.original: すごいそらちゃん！え、ポーズが...
subtitles.english: Amazing, Sora-chan! Eh, the poses...

subtitles.original: ...おのおの決まってて良いですね！
subtitles.english: ...are uniquely decided for each one, it's great!

subtitles.original: これみんながさ、だってさ、こういうポーズにしたいって潜在で撮ったのもさ！
subtitles.english: This is because everyone took these promotional photos in the poses they wanted!

subtitles.original: そうそうそう、撮った撮った！だから結構うちらですよ、これ！うちらですよ！
subtitles.english: Right, right, we took them! So it's really us! It's us!

subtitles.original: ねえ、やめなさい！何してんの？五期生の前出たら！五期生の前出てる、ほら！
subtitles.english: Hey, stop it! What are you doing? Getting in front of Gen 5! Look, you're in front of Gen 5!

subtitles.original:
ねえ、五期生もちゃんと見て！ほら、ぽちぽちぽち！
どんなんやったんか？こんなんやった！
subtitles.english:
Hey, look at Gen 5 too! Look, clap clap clap!
What kind did we do? We did this kind!

subtitles.original: こんなんやった！え、お前これ被るんだね？
subtitles.english: We did this kind! Eh, you're drawing this, huh?

subtitles.original: お前これ、後ろ...後ろから見るべき！見るべき！ハイハイハイ！
subtitles.english: You should... you should look at this from behind! From behind! Yes, yes, yes!

subtitles.original: え、そしてもう一つ！はい、ランダム缶バッジですね！
subtitles.english: And, one more thing! Yes, it's the random tin badges!

subtitles.original: これもヤバイね！こちらも35種類あるということで、すごいね！
subtitles.english: These are crazy too! These also have 35 types, amazing!

subtitles.original: ヤバイ！各世代どぼんとあります！
subtitles.english: Insane! All generations are lumped together!

subtitles.original: すごい！痛バッジ作れちゃうぜ、痛バッジ！
subtitles.english: Amazing! You can make an ita-bag, an ita-bag!

subtitles.original: カバンに貼ろう！カバンに貼ろう！
subtitles.english: Put them on your bag! Put them on your bag!

subtitles.original: そしてそして、なんとこちら！デデン！
subtitles.english: And, and, how about this! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: プレミアムアクリルパネル！プレミアムアクリルパネル！
subtitles.english: Premium Acrylic Panels! Premium Acrylic Panels!

subtitles.original: これはですね、全員集合しているプレミアムアクリルパネルこちらなんですけれども...
subtitles.english: This is the Premium Acrylic Panel featuring everyone together...

subtitles.original: ...こちらのみ、本日から9月14日まで受注生産となっておりますので、ぜひこのタイミングで手に入れてください！
subtitles.english: ...only this one is made-to-order until September 14th, so please get it while you can!

subtitles.original: これは受注生産だから気をつけるんだぞ！はい、気をつけてね！
subtitles.english: This is made-to-order, so be careful! Yes, be careful!

subtitles.original: 気をつけて！最後読んで、ねね！あ、はい！
subtitles.english: Be careful! Read the last part, Nene! Ah, okay!

subtitles.original: 詳細は概要欄にあるホロライブプロダクションオフィシャルショップをチェックしてください！
subtitles.english: Check the hololive Production Official Shop linked in the description for details!

subtitles.original: わかった！はい、丁寧丁寧に！チェックチェック！
subtitles.english: Understood! Yes, very politely! Check check!

subtitles.original: そして次の曲に行かないと間に合いません！ヤバイ、ヤバイ！行くぞ！
subtitles.english: And if we don't go to the next song, we won't make it! Oh no! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 次の曲へ！イェーイ！千載一遇のものは、こちら！
subtitles.english: To the next song! Yay! This once-in-a-lifetime piece is next!

subtitles.original: 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: To the Dreaming Sky

subtitles.original: 重ねた手はぎゅっと離さずに
subtitles.english: Never letting go of our joined hands

subtitles.original: 行くよ 行こう 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Let's go, to the dreaming sky

subtitles.original: 窓越しに見上げたとても小さな空
subtitles.english: The tiny sky I looked up at through the window

subtitles.original: ここで出会えたのは数えきれない奇跡
subtitles.english: Meeting here was an uncountable miracle

subtitles.original: 繰り返した一歩が煌めきを繋いで
subtitles.english: The repeated steps connect the sparkles

subtitles.original: 弾むような笑顔水色さ
subtitles.english: A bouncing smile, the color of water

subtitles.original: Step by step みんなの声が力になる
subtitles.english: Step by step, everyone's voices become strength

subtitles.original: Step by step ここでそれぞれ目指すもの
subtitles.english: Step by step, what each of us aims for here

subtitles.original: それぞれ描くもの...
subtitles.english: What each of us draws...

subtitles.original: ...それぞれ願った夢へ
subtitles.english: ...towards the dreams each of us wished for
